edu.cmu.cs.relab.tortoise

Class PrivacyRiskEstimateCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.cs.relab.tortoise.PrivacyRiskCalculator
      • edu.cmu.cs.relab.tortoise.PrivacyRiskEstimateCalculator

  • public class PrivacyRiskEstimateCalculator
extends PrivacyRiskCalculator
    Computes the privacy risk score based on a regression model with multiple parameters. The current parameters include privacy harm type, risk likelihood, and information type. The algorithm adjusts scores to include only factors that are statistically significant with a default p value less than 0.05.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    CMU RELAB

      • setPValue

        public void setPValue(double pvalue)
        Sets the p-value for whether to accept or reject interactions among factors.
        Parameters:
        pvalue - the minimum, inclusive p-value

      • setPrivacyHarm

        public void setPrivacyHarm(java.lang.String harm)
        Sets the default privacy harm to be used when scoring information types.
        Parameters:
        harm - the privacy harm

      • readData

        public void readData(DataSource estimates,
                     DataSource interactions)
        Reads the estimates and interactions from a data source. The estimates measure the relative weight of each factor, and the interactions measure the weight of interactions among factors.
        Parameters:
        estimates - the individual factor estimates
        interactions - the estimates among factors
